tool.name: Stemmer Lemmatizer

param.name: exclude_line
param.label: Provide the line/sentence to be excluded
param.help: This indicates the line to be excluded, which usually needs to be the same as the file delimiter in Dataset Merger if the input to this tool is from Dataset Merger. Leave it empty if the input is not produced by the Dataset Merger

param.name: delimiter
param.label: Choose the delimiter of separating phrases. This must be the same as the delimiter used for NP chunking. Leave it empty if the input is not from NP chunker
